title: BSA Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 38 Junior Resident Posts
description: Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Hospital has declared the latest job notification 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 38 Junior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can apply for the BSA Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BSA Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official ...
